articles.description: Tech giant Meta, parent company of social media apps Facebook and Instagram, is being probed by federal authorities related to the sale of illicit substances via its platforms.
articles.content:
Tech giant Meta and its various social media subsidiaries are under investigation regarding their use as a platform for drug sales.
